A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All over the place with no focus. Did Luke graphically milk the teat of an alien creature for a sip of blue milk? Nothing to do with Luke's motivation in LJ. Just a cheezy and unnecessary reference for New Hope fans. Too much sacrificed for a cheap laugh. Felt more like an insult than funny. Also\, Finn derailed the entire plan and jeopardized all of the rebels' lives because of parking his spaceship in a tow away zone?  REALLY?? A team of experienced writers ran with that plot point??? Oh yeah\, and another pod race to wager on but this time with unmanned tauntaun-like creatures instead. BRILLIANT! [No\, not really]. I could go on and on...
